name: Gift Boxed
description:
If you are buying a gift for that someone special, why not choose our Gift Box option. We will package your chosen goodies up with red tissue paper in a re-cycled crafted cardboard box, tie it in a bow with stunning silky red ribbon and attach our handmade Spirit of the Isle gift tag ready for you to write your message on.

The Gift Box will hold up to:-
5 soaps
4 scrubs or whipped soaps
1 soap and 2 scrubs or whipped soaps + 2 hand creams
2 soaps + 2 hand creams + 1 lip balm

Or similar to above combinations ;- please message me via the 'contact form' if you are unsure of suitable combination - we are quite flexible!

Just add the option to your basket, it is only £2 to add this option to your order then choose the goods you wish to buy to put inside.


**Leave a message at checkout if there are items in your order you do not want put in with the Gift boxed items OR if you are purchasing several gift boxes please contact us to give details **

name: Frankincense & Fig Handmade Soap
description:
The Scent ~ Fruity ripe fig fruit with a touch of green fig leaf spiked with white Frankincense for a beautiful, fresh herbaceous festive scent.

The Bar ~ One half is in Santa's cloak red, the other in spruce green, in the middle we have a light sprinkling of multicoloured soap confetti snowflake shreds. The top is finished in a two-tone swirling of both colours then sprinkled with some Christmas magic glitter dust!

100g

name: Sloe Gin Whipped Soap (body-wash)
description:
THE SCENT ~ Dark, intensely infused Sloe-berry Gin, laced with hints of Juniper and hedgerow fruits. Quite a rich, sophisticated and delicious scent!


Product description ~  A Whipped Soap body wash that has a rich, luxurious lather, decadently scented with your fragrance choice. Best used with a 'shower puff' but may also be used on a flannel or sponge. It's the consistency of a whipped cream soufflé, you just take a small scoop of this on your wet puff, to get oodles of bubbly lather that will cleanse your skin, leaving it soft and lightly scented. Packed with hydrating Natural Glycerine, and using a super-mild coconut derived foaming ingredient, this luxury body wash is kind and gentle on the skin.

*Sodium Lauryl Sulphate (SLS) FREE, *Parabens FREE, *Propylene Glycol FREE, *Tetrasodium EDTA Free

 ** This also makes for a luxuriously thick shaving lather **

100ml (by Volume) *As this is a whipped product weight may vary.

DIRECTIONS TO USE:-
1)	Get your skin and scrunchie wet.
2)	Deposit a blob of  body wash onto the scrunchie.
3)	Now work up a lather with it, cleanse your skin, then rinse with warm water.
4)	Re-apply as needed to the scrunchie as you cleanse.
5)	**Prevent water entering the product, to prolong product life.** 
6)     *Use within 6 months of opening.

name: Sloe Gin Hand & Body Cream
description:
THE SCENT ~ Dark, intensely infused Sloe-berry Gin, laced with hints of Juniper and hedgerow fruits. Quite a rich, sophisticated and delicious scent.


ABOUT OUR CREAMS  ~  Our Hand & Body Creams are handmade from scratch with our own unique recipe. They contain rich, emollient Natural Shea Nut Butter, Vitamin abundant Sunflower Seed oil and highly moisturising Sweet Almond oil, we also include anti-oxident Natural Vitamin E oil to help eliminate skin damaging free radicals. The Hand & Body Creams help lock in moisture, leaving your skin soft, non-greasy and lightly fragranced.   

Directions ~ Apply by massaging gently into clean, unbroken skin.    
Presented in beautiful cobalt blue jars and labeled with our unique, Island Logo. 

(weight 60g)

INGREDIENTS; Aqua (Welsh Spring Water), Emulsifying wax, Butyrospermum Parkii ( Shea Nut Butter), Prunus Dulcis (Almond Oil) , Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower Seed Oil), Stearic Acid (Vegetable Derived), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Phenoxyethanol; Caprylyl Glycol (Parabens Free Preservative), Alpha Tocopherol (Pure Vitamin E Oil) 
**Parfum or Essential Oils will vary with variety, as will sensitisers, so please see product label for this**

name: Christmas Spice Handmade Soap
description:
The Bar ~ Spruce green speckled with fine coffee grounds and studded here and there with jewelled embeds of ruby red and jade green. The wildly textured top is gilded with gold mica. This striking bar is enriched generously with Organic Cocoa Butter.

The Scent ~  A medley of Christmas spices; cinnamon, clove, allspice, nutmeg and ginger balanced by a grating of fresh orange rinds, the scent is slightly reminiscent of an old fashioned plum-pudding!

120g

name: Sweet Cranberry Body Scrub
description:
THE SCENT ~ Bright red, sweet, gleaming Cranberries and Redcurrant's just bursting with juice, such a luscious and uplifting festive red berry scent!


THE SCRUB  ~  This gently foaming, exfoliating Body Scrubs is totally handmade from beginning to end, using our own unique recipe. We use skin friendly Coconut derived foaming ingredients and the exfoliation comes from Fair Traded Cane Sugars and Ground Natural Rice Hulls. These wash and polish away dead skin cells, smooth roughened skin, revealing the softer, more radiant looking, silky smooth skin beneath. This product will not leave a greasy, ring around your bath nor will it make your shower floor dangerously slippery, as the mild, milky suds rinse clean away, leaving only a Natural Glycerine moisturising veil to nourish and Hydrate your skin.

TO USE  ~  Apply to your wet skin in the shower or bath and massage in circular motions, paying special attention to areas of rough, hard skin. The Scrub will froth lightly as it gets to work on those rough spots, then simply rinse away with water. Avoid sensitive areas or broken skin, not recommended for the facial area. Keep water out of the Jar to prolong the product life and keep it fresh.

* Tip ~  Keep the Jar upside down whilst showering, as the product is thick, it won't drip out readily, and this keeps the jar contents dry as you use it.

* We recommend completing your exfoliation treatment by locking in the moisture with our complimentary Hand & Body Creams in matching fragrance.

100ml (by volume)

Paraben free, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate SLS FREE, Propylene Glycol Free, Silicone Free, Tetrasodium EDTA Free.
*Contains Fairtrade ing. 
*Not tested on Animals.

description:
The Bar ~ A slice of soap cake!! The rich brown, rustic crackle- textured bar may have an air bubble hole or two in places but this won't affect the quality and great scent of this luxurious soap. name: Gingerbread Whipped Soap
description:
THE SCENT  ~  Syrupy stem ginger cake with a topping of crushed ginger-snaps and the lightest drizzling of Icing on top. A much loved teatime treat! This sweet-spiced, comforting scent will warm up those cold evenings and leave you smelling truly scrumptious!

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION ~
A Whipped Soap body wash that has a rich, luxurious lather, decadently scented with your fragrance choice. Best used with a 'shower puff' but may also be used on a flannel or sponge. It's the consistency of a whipped cream soufflé, you just take a small scoop of this on your wet puff, to get oodles of bubbly lather that will cleanse your skin, leaving it soft and lightly scented. Packed with hydrating Natural Glycerine, and using a super-mild coconut derived foaming ingredient, this luxury body wash is kind and gentle on the skin.

*Sodium Lauryl Sulphate (SLS) FREE, *Parabens FREE, *Propylene Glycol FREE, *Tetrasodium EDTA Free

 ** This also makes for a luxuriously thick shaving lather **

100ml (by Volume) *As this is a whipped product weight may vary.

DIRECTIONS TO USE:-
1)	Get your skin and scrunchie wet.
2)	Deposit a blob of  body wash onto the scrunchie.
3)	Now work up a lather with it, cleanse your skin, then rinse with warm water.
4)	Re-apply as needed to the scrunchie as you cleanse.
5)	**Prevent water entering the product, to prolong product life.** 
6)     *Use within 6 months of opening.

description:

name: LIP BALMS *choose variety*
description:
Lip Balms ~ Our Natural Lip Balms are all you need to keep your lips soft and smooth and ready to face the elements! Rich in Shea Butter and Natural Beeswax they’ll protect your lips and keep your pout perfect! 
Apply as needed to your lips throughout the day and also as part of your bedtime Beauty routine. Unlike petroleum based lip balms (which are derived from petrochemicals (bad for you and the environment), ours will not seal moisture out of the lips but will allow your skin to absorb the emollient rich oils within the balm nourishing your lips and locking in moisture, naturally.

They come packed in our 7ml cobalt blue glass jars, in 5 aroma-varieties that are subtle yet, pleasant on the lips ~

**If your flavour of choice is not on the drop-down menu, then we have sold out and will re-stock as soon as possible**

MINT SHOT ~ With Aromatic Spearmint Essential Oil, refreshing and ever so mildly tingly on the lips.

VANILLA COOKIE ~ With soft buttery, Vanilla and subtle Bakery notes, reminiscent of Mamma baking gooey vanilla cookies in the kitchen. Soothing and very comforting.

ORANGE JUICE ~ With Sweet Orange Essential Oil, subtle notes of natural fresh orange provide a mild citrus tang to the balm. *use caution if using in very strong sunlight, or on a sunbed, as citrus oils can cause sensitivity in the sun*

HONEYCOMB ~ This balm has the aroma of dark thick beehive Honey laced with subtle hints of Vanilla bean.

STRAWBERRY FAIR ~ *NEW FLAVOUR*  With a subtle natural aroma of fresh, garden strawberries (*not artificially sweetened)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**please note these lip balms do not have a ‘taste’ to them, only a subtle aroma when applied to the lips. In our opinion, sweet lip balms only encourage licking of the lips and so make them even more chapped, therefore defeating the object of applying a lip balm**


~~~~~~~~~~~~

Ingredients;
Shea Nut Butter, Coconut Oil, Olive Fruit Oil, Natural Beeswax, Castor Seed Oil, *Aroma OR *Essential oil *(dependant on which variety chosen).

name: Strawberry Fair Body Scrub
description:
THE FRAGRANCE ~ Ripe, ruby red Summer Strawberries, fresh from the kitchen garden, sprinkled with sugar and lightly drizzled with dairy cream. A true Summer delight!

THE SCRUB  ~  These gently foaming, exfoliating Body Scrubs are totally handmade from beginning to end, using our own unique recipe. We use skin friendly Coconut derived foaming ingredients and the exfoliation comes from Fair Traded Cane Sugars and Ground Natural Rice Hulls. These wash and polish away dead skin cells, smooth roughened skin, revealing the softer, more radiant looking, silky smooth skin beneath. This product will not leave a greasy, ring around your bath nor will it make your shower floor dangerously slippery, as the mild, milky suds rinse clean away, leaving only a Natural Glycerine moisturising veil to nourish and Hydrate your skin.

TO USE  ~  Apply to your wet skin in the shower or bath and massage in circular motions, paying special attention to areas of rough, hard skin. The Scrub will froth lightly as it gets to work on those rough spots, then simply rinse away with water. Avoid sensitive areas or broken skin, not recommended for the facial area. Keep water out of the Jar to prolong the product life and keep it fresh.

* Tip ~  Keep the Jar upside down whilst showering, as the product is thick, it won't drip out readily, and this keeps the jar contents dry as you use it.

* We recommend completing your exfoliation treatment by locking in the moisture with our complimentary Hand & Body Creams in your fragrance of choice.

100ml (by volume) *may also come in cobalt blue jars.

name: Peach Nectar Body Scrub
description:
THE FRAGRANCE ~ The uplifting aroma of fresh, juicy, ripe Peaches & Nectarines doused in Blossom Honey.

THE SCRUB  ~  These gently foaming, exfoliating Body Scrubs are totally handmade from beginning to end, using our own unique recipe. We use skin friendly Coconut derived foaming ingredients and the exfoliation comes from Fair Traded Cane Sugars and Ground Natural Rice Hulls. These wash and polish away dead skin cells, smooth roughened skin, revealing the softer, more radiant looking, silky smooth skin beneath. This product will not leave a greasy, ring around your bath nor will it make your shower floor dangerously slippery, as the mild, milky suds rinse clean away, leaving only a Natural Glycerine moisturising veil to nourish and Hydrate your skin.

TO USE  ~  Apply to your wet skin in the shower or bath and massage in circular motions, paying special attention to areas of rough, hard skin. The Scrub will froth lightly as it gets to work on those rough spots, then simply rinse away with water. Avoid sensitive areas or broken skin, not recommended for the facial area. Keep water out of the Jar to prolong the product life and keep it fresh.

* Tip ~  Keep the Jar upside down whilst showering, as the product is thick, it won't drip out readily, and this keeps the jar contents dry as you use it.

* We recommend completing your exfoliation treatment by locking in the moisture with our complimentary Hand & Body Creams in your fragrance of choice.

name: Bohemian Hand & Body Cream
description:
The Scent  ~ Sweet, sultry soft Amber is tempered by blackened Vanilla and mystifying Patchouli in this rich, alluring and intoxicating blend. Sophisticated, dark and very intense. Make a statement with this bold Boho fragrance!


ABOUT OUR CREAMS  ~  Our Hand & Body Creams are handmade from scratch with our own unique recipe. They contain rich, emollient Natural Shea Nut Butter, Vitamin abundant Sunflower Seed oil and highly moisturising Sweet Almond oil, we also include anti-oxident Natural Vitamin E oil to help eliminate skin damaging free radicals. The Hand & Body Creams help lock in moisture, leaving your skin soft, non-greasy and lightly fragranced.   

Directions ~ Apply by massaging gently into clean, unbroken skin.    
Presented in beautiful cobalt blue jars and labeled with our unique, Island Logo. 

(weight 60g)

INGREDIENTS; Aqua (Welsh Spring Water), Emulsifying wax, Butyrospermum Parkii ( Shea Nut Butter), Prunus Dulcis (Almond Oil) , Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower Seed Oil), Stearic Acid (Vegetable Derived), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Phenoxyethanol; Caprylyl Glycol (Parabens Free Preservative), Alpha Tocopherol (Pure Vitamin E Oil) 
**Parfum or Essential Oils will vary with variety, as will sensitisers, so please see product label for this**

name: Bohemian Whipped Soap
description:
The Scent  ~ Sweet, sultry soft Amber is tempered by blackened Vanilla and mystifying Patchouli in this rich, alluring and intoxicating blend. Sophisticated, dark and very intense. Make a statement with this bold Boho fragrance!   


PRODUCT DESCRIPTION ~  A Whipped Soap body wash that has a rich, luxurious lather, decadently scented with your fragrance choice. Best used with a 'shower puff' but may also be used on a flannel or sponge. It's the consistency of a whipped cream soufflé, you just take a small scoop of this on your wet puff, to get oodles of bubbly lather that will cleanse your skin, leaving it soft and lightly scented. Packed with hydrating Natural Glycerine, and using a super-mild coconut derived foaming ingredient, this luxury body wash is kind and gentle on the skin.

*Sodium Lauryl Sulphate (SLS) FREE, *Parabens FREE, *Propylene Glycol FREE, *Tetrasodium EDTA Free

 ** This also makes for a luxuriously thick shaving lather **

100ml (by Volume) *As this is a whipped product weight may vary.

DIRECTIONS TO USE:-
1)	Get your skin and scrunchie wet.
2)	Deposit a blob of  body wash onto the scrunchie.
3)	Now work up a lather with it, cleanse your skin, then rinse with warm water.
4)	Re-apply as needed to the scrunchie as you cleanse.
5)	**Prevent water entering the product, to prolong product life.** 
6)     *Use within 6 months of opening.

description:

THE SCRUB  ~  This gently foaming, exfoliating Body Scrubs is totally handmade from beginning to end, using our own unique recipe. We use skin friendly Coconut derived foaming ingredients and the exfoliation comes from Fair Traded Cane Sugars and Ground Natural Rice Hulls. These wash and polish away dead skin cells, smooth roughened skin, revealing the softer, more radiant looking, silky smooth skin beneath. This product will not leave a greasy, ring around your bath nor will it make your shower floor dangerously slippery, as the mild, milky suds rinse clean away, leaving only a Natural Glycerine moisturising veil to nourish and Hydrate your skin.

TO USE  ~  Apply to your wet skin in the shower or bath and massage in circular motions, paying special attention to areas of rough, hard skin. The Scrub will froth lightly as it gets to work on those rough spots, then simply rinse away with water. Avoid sensitive areas or broken skin, not recommended for the facial area. Keep water out of the Jar to prolong the product life and keep it fresh.

* Tip ~  Keep the Jar upside down whilst showering, as the product is thick, it won't drip out readily, and this keeps the jar contents dry as you use it.

* We recommend completing your exfoliation treatment by locking in the moisture with our complimentary Hand & Body Creams in matching fragrance.

description:
ORIENTAL BAMBOO

THE BAR ~   Cool Jungle green with contrasting black lines. The bar is  crinkle cut to evoke images of bamboo caned walls then finished with poppy seeds and a contrasting white feather drizzle on top.


THE FRAGRANCE  ~  The essence of newly cut Bamboo canes and fresh green Fig leaves conclude with an Oriental citrus twist. A fresh and invigorating, Green aroma and Unisex Blend. 
Contains Green Clay for a deep cleanse, this bar is also crinkle cut for extra massage whilst skin cleansing. This is a great choice for the man in your life!! but just as gorgeous for the girls!!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

name: Nag Champa incense soap / sebon arogldaith Nag Champa
description:
The Scent  ~  Unique and classic, like a visit to a Mysore Indian market or a journey back in time to the Woodstock Rock Festival of '69' - Queen of all incenses, Nag Champa. A scent enjoyed equally by men and women all over the world. Our blend is almost exactly like it. A deep, smoky indian Sandalwood smoulders beneath a sweet, powdery Musk, scattered with fragrant Champa flowers and closely followed by whispers of light Patchouli and Vanilla. Relaxing, mystical, meditating and dare I say it - sexy!! (a well known aphrodisiac in its native country of India) It will leave you wanting more!!


The Bar  ~  Thick, chunky bars of luxury, enriched with Organic Cocoa Butter. Column swirls of Red Kaolin Clay and natural Rose petals mildly exfoliate. The bar yields a thick, creamy lather that's kind to the skin, non-drying and rich in natural glycerine. Finished with a scattering of black Caraway seeds to decorate.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



Yr Arogl  ~  Unigryw a chlasurol, fel ymweliad i farchnad ym Mysore, India neu siwrna ‘nol mewn amser I wyl roc Woodstock yn ‘69’ – Brenhines pob arogldaith, Nag Champa. Persawr â fwynhad yn gyfartal gan ddynion a merched led-led y Byd. Mae cyfuniad ni bron 'run fath.  Sandalwood Indiaidd yn mudlosgi’n dyner, Mwsg melys wedi’i wasgaru â blodau Champa persawrus, yna'n dilyn â sibrydion ysgafn o Phatsiwli a Fanila. Mae’n ymlacio’r meddwl, yn gyfriniol drost ben, ac yn creu myfyrdod, … a mi fentraf ddweud – yn rhywiol!! (mae’n affrodisiad adnabyddus yn ei wlad enedigol o India) Bydd yn eich gadael yn eisiau ‘chwaneg!!


Y Bar ~  Talpiau trwchus, moethus yn gyfoethog o Ymenyn Coco organig. Ynddynt rhêd chwyrliau o glai coch a phetalau rhosod mân i ddi-blisgo’r croen yn dyner. description:
~  An intensive and super rich skin conditioning balm  excellent for dry, rough skin that lacks vitality and tone but equally suitable for all skin types. It's wonderful for softening hard working hands too. Great for sensitive skin, as it has no artificial additives. Made with a high percentage of pure antioxidant rich and emollient Shea Butter, vitamin abundant Olive Oil, skin softening and nourishing Coconut oil, moisture locking natural Beeswax and last but definitely not least - Pure Vitamin E oil to help repair damaged or scarred skin and also for its potent antioxidant qualities.

 ~ Like our matching 'Queen of Shea-Bar' handmade soap, this Balm is 100% Pure & Natural and Free From all additives, No Parabens, No petroleum, No colouring, No fragrance, No notifiable allergens. Just pure, gentle, natural Oils, Butters and Waxes that nourish the skin gently and safely.

Directions ~ Best results obtained by applying to slightly damp skin, after bathing, so as to 'lock in' moisture. Massage the Balm gently into areas of Dry Skin as often as needed. Great as an after-sun product to moisturise dry or tanned skin and also useful to prevent stretch-marks by increasing your skin's suppleness. For an overnight intensive skin conditioning treatment; apply to hands generously, then sleep in cotton gloves for softer, smoother hands, you can also do the same for your feet waring cotton socks. Can be used on dry skin all over your body, from rough elbows to flaky nail cuticles and even on dry, split hair ends! Excellent as a 'post exfoliation' balm too. 
 ~  Mild enough for facial use, this balm is wonderful when used as a night time cleanser, simply remove excess make-up, apply softened balm to face with fingertips in circular motions, then rinse with warm water and pat dry.

 ~  For a 'Mini Facial'  ~  Remove excess make-up, massage the Balm into your face gently using fingertips. Then wring out a Facial Muslin (available in drop down menu) soaked in hot water and gently squeezed out. Open out and place on your face for a few seconds (or more if you have time) to allow the moisture and the Balm to penetrate the skin. Now simply wipe away the day's grime using the muslin gently on your face and voila! - moisturised, cleansed and exfoliated skin the 100% natural way!! 
You may follow up with a splash of cold water to close any open pores and finish with our Balance & Hydrate Face Cream.
  This nourishing Body Balm has so many uses it's one you just can't do without!

*Wash your muslin in hot soapy water after each use and dry naturally, or on a radiator,(they dry very quickly!) The muslins also have a mild exfoliating action on the face.

description:
~ Please select your product from the drop-down menu.
**Buy all 3 different facial products for £18 (giving you 10% off)


BALANCE & HYDRATE FACE CREAM ~ £10.99
The Nourishment ~ A rich yet light textured, intensely nourishing Facial Cream. Suitable for all skin types.
      Contains ‘Raspberry Seed Oil’ rich in Omega 3 and 6 fatty acids, known to boost the skin and help plump up its appearance. Raspberries are indeed the latest ingredient to be harvested for their collagen protecting stem cells!
        We have also added ‘Vitamin E’ oil, renowned for its antioxidant powers that help neutralize those ageing ‘free radicals’ and also for its powers to promote cell repair.
         Further enrichment comes in the form of the active ingredients ‘Silk Amino Acids’ these natural proteins assist the skin to repair itself and also bring a wonderful feel to the product.
         And lastly we add the power of Botanicals! -‘Bourbon Geranium Essential Oil’ famous for its aroma-therapeutic qualities and for its properties of balancing oil production within the skin.
         Balance & Hydrate Face cream is also ‘pH balanced’ so as not to upset your skin's naturally protective acid mantle.

**No Parabens, Petroleum, Propylene Glycol, SLS, artificial colour or fragrances.

Directions ~  Apply to freshly cleansed face and neck, day and night by massaging in circular motions. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs discontinue use.

50g

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

PURIFYING PINK CLAY FACIAL SCRUB ~ £4.99
About ~ This luxurious Exfoliation Scrub is full of skin emollient Natural Oils including Shea Butter, Olive, Coconut and and Vitamin E, to ensure your precious face is nourished and cared for while the 'Triple Action'  exfoliants (fine exfoliant - Clay/ medium exfoliant - fine rice hulls/ courser exfoliant - fair trade cane sugar)  agents do their magic!
      We pack the emulsified oil base with 3 exfoliants, and each brings its own merit to the product. First we add Fair Traded Cane Sugar, an excellent all round buffer and skin humactant, secondly we add powdered Natural Rice Hulls - these offer more staying power as the grains resist being dissolved away as you massage, then thirdly we add Natural Rose Pink Clay, and this brings with it the power of deep cleansing and purification as its fine exfoliation powers helps unclog pores and wash away impurities. Bourbon Geranium Essential Oil is then included for its aroma-therapeutic, astringent and oil balancing properties.
** Not advised for Sensitive, inflamed or broken skin.

Why Use it ~ The skin’s ability to renew itself slows down with age so you need to work at removing dead skin cells if you want to reveal the younger looking skin beneath. By using an exfoliating Facial Scrub a couple of times a week to slough dull, old skin cells away, you will notice your skin looking more luminous and smooth. It will also reduce blackheads and pimple formation, leaving your complexion looking healthier and more vibrant. Also you will find that your moisturizer absorbs into your skin easier, since you have removed that obstructive horny layer that so often gives a dull, sallow appearance. 
            
Directions ~ To use, first wet your face with warm water, then scoop a teaspoon size of scrub into the palm of your hand. Now, with the scrub in the palms of both hands, apply to your face, gently massaging in circular motions (whilst avoiding the delicate eye contour area) Apply only as much pressure as needed for your skin type; (Sensitive Skin – mild scrubbing pressure only) If you have time you may leave the scrub on your face a minute or two so that the Clay gets a chance to draw out impurities as a facemask would do. Then rinse away with tepid water followed by a shot of cold water to close the pores once again. Then apply Face Cream. *Keep water out of jar to prolong product life.

**No Parabens, Petroleum, Propylene Glycol, SLS, Artificial Colour or Fragrance, contains Fairtrade ingredient.

PINK CLAY & GERANIUM FACIAL WASH ~ £3.99 
ABOUT ~  Our gentle Facial Cleansing Wash is a firm creamy consistency  and comes in a jar. It lathers  softly to cleanse away impurities from the face but will not strip the natural oils from your complexion. There are no harsh surfactants in this wash, No Sodium Lauryl Sulphate here! Instead we use ultra mild, coconut derived foaming agents, clinically proven to be mild on the skin. Our Face Wash also has a Neutral pH. The main ingredient in the wash is nourishing and humactant Vegetable Glycerine, a natural moisture trap for the skin, this helps hydrate the skin and draw moisture to it. We then add emollient Shea Butter and pure Vitamin E oil to soften and protect. Lastly we add French Rose Pink Clay for its cleansing and purifying properties and also botanical plant extract of Bourbon Geranium Essential Oil to help balance oil production, tone and close open pores. Leaving you with fresh, clean skin.
Best for Normal / Combination Skin types.

DIRECTIONS ~ Wet face and hands with warm water, scoop out a pea sized amount of Facial Wash (*taking care not to get water into the product) massage in your hands till a light froth is formed, now cleanse your face with it, then rinse clean with tepid water, followed by a shot of cold water to help close the skin pores. You may also use a small, wet, natural sponge or muslin with the Wash if you prefer. *Keep water out of jar to prolong product life. Pat face dry with a clean towel, then follow with our  Balance & Hydrate Face Cream to seal in moisture.

     Mae’n cynnwys 'Olew Had Mafon' sy’n gyfoethog o ran asidau brasterog Omega 3 a 6, sy’n rhoi hwb i'r croen ac yn help i blwmpio i fyny ei ymddangosiad.  Yn wir, mae Mafon yn un o’r cynhwysion diweddaraf i gael eu cynaeafu ar gyfer eu  celloedd bonyn sy’n helpu diogelu colagen yn y croen!

     Yn olaf rydym yn ychwanegu grym Botaneg! - 'Olew Hanfodol Bourbon Geranium’ sy’n enwog am ei arogl-therapiwtig ac ar gyfer ei nodweddion o gydbwyso cynhyrchiad olew naturiol o fewn y croen.
      Mae’n Hufen Gwyneb hefyd yn ‘gytbwys ei pH’ er mwyn peidio ag amharu ar fantell asid amddiffynnol naturiol eich croen.

I'W DDEFNYDDIO ~ Rhoddwch ar groen glan y gwyneb a'r gwddf, a'i
 dylino'n ysgafn mewn cylchoedd. Ceisiwch osgoi'r llygaid. Os bydd yn creu llid, yna rhowch gorau i'w ddefnyddio.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

YMOLCH GWYNEB:CLAI PINC A GERANIUM ~  £3.99  
AMDANO ~ Mae’n Ymolch Gwyneb o gysondeb hufennog, cadarn ac yn dod mewn jar. Mae'n frothian yn ysgafn i lanhau i ffwrdd amhureddau o'r wyneb, ond ni fydd yn or-dynny olewau naturiol or croen. Nid oes unrhyw gwlychwyr (surfactants) llym ynddo, dim Sodiwm Lauryl Sylffad yma! Yn hytrach, rydym yn defnyddio asiantau byrlymu addfwyn, sy’n deillio o cnau coco ac wedi’i profi’n glinigol i fod yn ysgafn ar y croen. Mae pH niwtral ar yr ymolch gwyneb. Y prif gynhwysyn yn yr ymolch yw Glycerine Naturiol maethlon, mae hwn yn addfwyn ar y croen ac yn tynnu lleithder iddo. Yna, rydym yn ychwanegu Menyn Shea ac Olew Fitamin E pur i feddalu a diogelu ymhellach. Yn olaf rydym yn ychwanegu Clai Pinc ar gyfer ei ddawn o lanhau a phuro’r croen ac hefyd Olew Hanfodol Bourbon Geranium i helpu gynhyrchu cydbwysedd o’r olewon yn y croen, a cau y mandyllau agored. Y canlyniad yw croen glân a ffres.

CYFARWYDDIADAU ~ Gwlychwch eich gwyneb a dwylo gyda dŵr cynnes. Tynnwch ddarn maint cneuen or Ymolch Gwyneb, yna ei dylino yn eich dwylo tan mae ewyn yn cael ei ffurfio, yna golchwch eich wyneb yn y ffordd arferol, rinsiwch gyda dŵr glân claear, ac yna ergyd o dŵr oer i gau'r mandyllau croen. Efallai y byddwch hefyd yn defnyddio sbwng bach, naturiol os yw'n well gennych. *Cadwch dŵr allan o'r jar i ymestyn oes y cynnyrch. Sychwch gyda lliain glân. Dilynwch â’n Hufen Gwyneb i gael y canlyniadau gorau.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

SGRWB GWYNEB: CLAI PURO PINC ~ £4.99
AMDANO ~  Mae’r Sgrwb moethus hwn, yn llawn olewau naturiol emollient  sy’n cynnwys Menyn Shea, olewon yr Olewydd, Cnau Coco a Fitamin E, er mwyn sicrhau bod croen gwerthfawr eich gwyneb yn derbyn maeth a gofal tra bod yr asiantau di-blisgo’n gwneud eu hud!
Rydym yn pacio’r gymysgedd maethlon hwn â 3 di-blisgwr gwahanol, a mae pob un yn dod a'i deilyngdod ei hun i'r cynnyrch. Yn gyntaf rydym yn ychwanegu Siwgwr Masnach Teg sydd yn wych i bwffio’r croen, yn ail rydym yn ychwanegu powdr Reis Naturiol sydd yn cynnig mwy o bwer-aros gan fod y gronynnau’n gyndyn o gael ei diddymu i ffwrdd yn y dwr wrth i chi dylino, yna yn drydydd rydym yn ychwanegu Clai Pink Naturiol - mae hwn yn dod a grym glanhau dwfn ac yn help i buro ac lanhau mandyllau’r croen a golchi i ffwrdd amhureddau wrth i chi dylino. Yn olaf ychwanegwn olew hanfodol ‘Bourbon Geranium’ ar gyfer ei nodweddion-therapiwtig, a’i eiddo cydbwyso olew ac hefyd I helpu gau’r mandyllau.

PAM EI DDEFNYDDIO?  ~  Mae gallu’r croen i adnewyddu ei hun yn arafu gydag oedran, felly mae angen i chi weithio at gael gwared â’r celloedd croen marw os ydych am ddatgelu’r  croen iau oddi tano. Drwy ddefnyddio prysgwydd (exfoliators) gwyneb, cwpl o weithiau yr wythnos i sgrwbio’r hen gelloedd diflas i ffwrdd, byddwch yn sylwi eich croen yn edrych yn fwy llyfn a goleuol. Bydd hefyd yn lleihau'r pennau-duon a’r plorod, gan adael eich gwedd yn edrych yn iachach ac yn fwy bywiog. Hefyd, byddwch yn canfod bod eich Hufen Gwyneb yn suddo i mewn i'ch croen yn haws, gan eich bod wedi cael gwared ar y haen corniog, rhwystrol, sydd mor aml yn rhoi ymddangosiad dwl a llwyd i’r gwedd.

CYFARWYDDIADAU ~  I’w ddefnyddio, gwlychwch eich gwyneb gyda dŵr cynnes, yna cymerwch maint llwy de o’r Sgrwb i mewn i gledr eich llaw, yna tasgu mymryn bach iawn o ddŵr arno a’i gymysgu i gysondeb ‘past’ ychydig yn deneuach nag yr oedd. Yn awr, gyda'r past yng nghledrau’r ddwy law, tylinwch y gymysgedd yn ysgafn mewn i’r gwyneb gan ddefnyddio symudiadau cylchol (ac osgoi'r ardal amlinell y llygad fregus) Ymgeisiwch rhoi gymaint o bwysau tylino yn ôl yr angen ar gyfer eich math o groen e.e – ‘croen sensitif’ - pwysau sgrwbio ysgafn yn unig. Os oes gennych amser, efallai y byddwch yn gadael y Sgrwb ar eich gwyneb funud neu ddau fel bod y Clai yn cael cyfle i dynnu amhureddau - fel y byddai mewn ‘mwgwd gwyneb’. Wedyn, golchwch i ffwrdd gyda dŵr claear ac yno, ergyd o ddŵr oer i gau'r mandyllau unwaith eto. Cewch ddilyn y driniaeth â Hufen Gwyneb (gweler ein Hufen Hydaru a Chydbwyso)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



*Gweler y cynhwysion a'r manylion prîs, pwysau etc. yn y disgrifiad Saesneg*

name: All Hallows' Eve Body Scrub
description:
All Hallows' Eve Scent Description :~
The hubble-bubble potion of a Witches Cauldron brews away over a cackling fire. Sweet spices and syrups create a concoction to delight! An aromatic blend of Cardamom and spiced syrups simmers gently whilst scarlet red Cox's Toffee Apples bob up and down mischievously on the surface. Jewels of Amber resin and old fashioned Butter Toffee conclude this deliciously intriguing blend.

THE SCRUB  ~  This gently foaming, exfoliating Body Scrubs is totally handmade from beginning to end, using our own unique recipe. We use skin friendly Coconut derived foaming ingredients and the exfoliation comes from Fair Traded Cane Sugars and Ground Natural Rice Hulls. These wash and polish away dead skin cells, smooth roughened skin, revealing the softer, more radiant looking, silky smooth skin beneath. This product will not leave a greasy, ring around your bath nor will it make your shower floor dangerously slippery, as the mild, milky suds rinse clean away, leaving only a Natural Glycerine moisturising veil to nourish and Hydrate your skin.

TO USE  ~  Apply to your wet skin in the shower or bath and massage in circular motions, paying special attention to areas of rough, hard skin. The Scrub will froth lightly as it gets to work on those rough spots, then simply rinse away with water. Avoid sensitive areas or broken skin, not recommended for the facial area. Keep water out of the Jar to prolong the product life and keep it fresh.

* Tip ~  Keep the Jar upside down whilst showering, as the product is thick, it won't drip out readily, and this keeps the jar contents dry as you use it.

* We recommend completing your exfoliation treatment by locking in the moisture with our complimentary Hand & Body Creams in matching fragrance.

100ml (by volume)

Paraben free, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate SLS FREE, Propylene Glycol Free, Silicone Free, Tetrasodium EDTA Free.
*Contains Fairtrade ing. 
*Not tested on Animals.

name: All Hallows' Eve Whipped Soap
description:
All Hallows' Eve Scent Description :~
The hubble-bubble potion of a Witches Cauldron brews away over a cackling fire. Sweet spices and syrups create a concoction to delight! An aromatic blend of Cardamom and spiced syrups simmers gently whilst scarlet red Cox's Toffee Apples bob up and down mischievously on the surface. Jewels of Amber resin and old fashioned Butter Toffee conclude this deliciously intriguing blend.

Description ~
A Whipped Soap body wash that has a rich, luxurious lather, decadently scented with your fragrance choice. Best used with a 'shower puff' but may also be used on a flannel or sponge. It's the consistency of a whipped cream soufflé, you just take a small scoop of this on your wet puff, to get oodles of bubbly lather that will cleanse your skin, leaving it soft and lightly scented. Packed with hydrating Natural Glycerine, and using a super-mild coconut derived foaming ingredient, this luxury body wash is kind and gentle on the skin.

*Sodium Lauryl Sulphate (SLS) FREE, *Parabens FREE, *Propylene Glycol FREE, *Tetrasodium EDTA Free

 ** This also makes for a luxuriously thick shaving lather **

100ml (by Volume) *As this is a whipped product weight may vary.

TO USE:-
1)	Get your skin and scrunchie wet.
2)	Deposit a blob of  body wash onto the scrunchie.
3)	Now work up a lather with it, cleanse your skin, then rinse with warm water.
4)	Re-apply as needed to the scrunchie as you cleanse.
5)	**Prevent water entering the product, to prolong product life.** 
6)     *Use within 6 months of opening.

name: All Hallows' Eve Hand & Body Cream
description:
ALL HALLOWS' EVE
Scent description ~ The hubble-bubble potion of a Witches Cauldron brews away over a cackling fire. Sweet spices and syrups create a concoction to delight! An aromatic blend of Cardamom and spiced syrups simmers gently whilst scarlet red Cox's Toffee Apples bob up and down mischievously on the surface. Jewels of Amber resin and old fashioned Butter Toffee conclude this deliciously intriguing blend.

ABOUT OUR CREAMS  ~  Our Hand & Body Creams are handmade from scratch with our own unique recipe. They contain rich, emollient Natural Shea Nut Butter, Vitamin abundant Sunflower Seed oil and highly moisturising Sweet Almond oil, we also include anti-oxident Natural Vitamin E oil to help eliminate skin damaging free radicals. The Hand & Body Creams help lock in moisture, leaving your skin soft, non-greasy and lightly fragranced.   

Directions ~ Apply by massaging gently into clean, unbroken skin.    
Presented in beautiful cobalt blue jars and labeled with our unique, Island Logo. 

(weight 60g)

INGREDIENTS; Aqua (Welsh Spring Water), Emulsifying wax, Butyrospermum Parkii ( Shea Nut Butter), Prunus Dulcis (Almond Oil) , Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower Seed Oil), Stearic Acid (Vegetable Derived), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Phenoxyethanol; Caprylyl Glycol (Parabens Free Preservative), Alpha Tocopherol (Pure Vitamin E Oil) 
**Parfum or Essential Oils will vary with variety, as will sensitisers, so please see product label for this**

Also available in the following ~ Whipped Soap (body-wash) and Body Scrub.
